author: Dr. Susan Berry, Dr. Susan Berry
title: Abortion Providers Sue as More States Halt Procedure to Preserve Medical Equipment
description: The ACLU filed a lawsuit challenging the Iowa governor’s order to halt abortions to preserve medical equipment during the coronavirus crisis.
content: The American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) filed a lawsuit Monday that challenged the Iowa governors order to stop abortion providers from performing the procedure in the state in order to preserve personal protective equipment (PPE) for healthcare workers who… [+4402 chars]
